quote_first: You got to let the world go to hell in its own way, Gard,
title: The Tommyknockers
author: Stephen King

quote_last: . The whole of our recorded history, on this scale, would be no more than a few seconds, a single human lifetime barely an instant.
quote_time_case: one minute and seventeen seconds before midnight
title: A Short History of Nearly Everything
author: Bill Bryson
